ud4.1:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Cālikā, on the Cālikā mountain.
ud4.1:1.3: Now, at that time Venerable Meghiya was the Buddha’s attendant.
ud4.1:1.4: Then Venerable Meghiya went up to the Buddha, bowed, stood to one side, and said to him,
ud4.1:1.6: “Sir, I’d like to enter Jantu village for alms.”
